pain_points.title: Feeling frustrated on the mat?
points: Tired of relying only on pulling guard and never being able to impose your game?
Always on the bottom, being dominated by more experienced opponents?
Frustrated that you can't take anyone down, even after training for months?
Embarrassed when everyone is watching and you just can't get the person off their feet?
Losing fights you could win if you knew how to control the standing fight?
pain_points.recognition_text: Do you recognize this situation? I lived it myself for years until I discovered what really works.

testimonials_section.title: These are some of our students who started taking down their opponents

items.text: Thanks, professor! The course is so well-explained that it leaves no doubts. My students are very excited, they are developing in a short time what many would take years to do. I am the one who has to thank you!!! Later we will arrange for you to do a seminar here in the city and region.
Very good, brother. You make things so simple ❤️. True geniuses (teachers) take complex things and make them simple ❤️. Congratulations.

Congratulations on the initiative of the online course, many small towns like mine don't have specialists in the area! But with a slightly advanced knowledge of jiu-jitsu, we can learn through videos and self-correct!

course_modules.title: Following this path is how they got to this result

module1.title: BASIC MOVEMENTS
module1.description: This module teaches you the most effective takedowns of modern wrestling with a unique methodology: each technique is broken down into its essential components to ensure perfect execution. You will master the two takedowns that solve 80% of situations - Single Leg and Double Leg - in addition to their most lethal variations and the defenses that will make you impossible to take down.

module2.title: ENTRIES EVERY GRAPPLER MUST KNOW
module2.description: Mastering takedowns without knowing how to create opportunities is useless. This module teaches the setups and entries that turn any defensive situation into a guaranteed takedown chance. You will learn to "see" openings where others only see closed guards.
module2.why_it_works_description: While 90% force takedowns against prepared opponents, you will create your own opportunities, making your takedowns seem "too easy."

module3.title: WAISTLOCKS AND CLINCH
module3.description: When the fight gets tight, whoever dominates the clinch dominates everything. You will learn the waistlocks and techniques that make opponents feel stuck in a vice - impossible to escape.
module3.why_it_works_description: In the clinch, technique beats strength. Even if you're smaller, you'll control bigger opponents through leverage and intelligent pressure.

module4.title: DEFENSES
module4.description: A solid defense is your secret weapon to defeat any opponent. Here you learn that it is much more exhausting to attack than to defend - and how to use this to your advantage. While your opponents exhaust themselves trying to take you down, you conserve energy and wait for the perfect moment to attack.

module5.title: DRILLS
module5.description: Knowing the techniques is just the beginning - mastering is about intelligent repetition. This module teaches you the specific drills that engrave movements in your muscle memory until they become automatic. It's the difference between knowing how to do it and doing it without thinking.

module6.title: BONUS
module6.description: The techniques that few know and even fewer master. This bonus module reveals elite movements that combine wrestling with judo, advanced defenses against submissions, and spectacular takedowns that leave opponents speechless. They are the trump cards that turn good fighters into unbeatable ones.

whatsapp_section.title: Still have doubts if the course is for you?
whatsapp_section.description: Talk to my team on WhatsApp now and we'll clear up any doubts you still have about the course.

items.question: How long do I have access?
items.answer: Course access is for life, so you will only pay once and can access the content whenever you want.

items.question: Is there a certificate?
items.answer: Yes, upon completing all course content, you will be able to issue a certificate.

items.question: Where can I access the course?
items.answer: Your access will be through Kiwify.

items.question: How will I receive my access?
items.answer: You will receive an email to your registered email at the time of purchase with all access information.

items.question: Are the classes online?
items.answer: Yes, all course content is 100% online.

legal_page.title: Policies and Terms of Service
legal_page.subtitle: Below, you will find detailed information about our privacy policies, cookies, and terms of service.

privacy_policy.title: PRIVACY POLICIES
privacy_policy.section1_p1: 1.1 It is important for us to collect some information from the users of our services so that we can offer a better and more tailored website to your preferences. We also need to inform you about news and relevant information. Therefore, please read this policy and our terms of use carefully.
privacy_policy.section1_p2: 1.2 We guarantee that any personal information of users will not be provided, published, or commercialized under any circumstances. This information is safe with us. Except in cases where the user participates in a comment or post. In this case, the name, email, and testimonial may be published, in accordance with our terms of use.

cookies_policy.title: COOKIES POLICIES
cookies_policy.section1_p1: 1. We may use cookie technology to improve the user experience. This helps in identifying your IP, making navigation easier and customizing your Browse. You can block any use of cookies directly in your browser.
